long_description: Don't want a bulky battery pack on your boots? The Hotronic Extension Cords attaches your Hotronic battery pack at your waist (80cm) or your chest (120cm). Hotronic Extension Cords work with the Hotronic FootWarmer e4 Power Plus Battery Pack, Power Plus Heating Elements and the Semi Custom Heat Ready Insoles, sold separately.
short_description: Don't want a bulky battery pack on your boots? The Hotronic Extension Cords attaches your Hotronic battery pack at your waist (80cm) or your chest (120cm).
